messages.message:
Hey all, please join in for @Ashish’s Tech Talk on “_A brief history and usage of Flask at Instabase”_ at 8:30am PT today (right after the AMA).  Flask is a web framework for Python and is used heavily at Instabase for all of our web services.
*When*: Fri 5/20 8:30-9:15am PT
*Where*: Zoom Link (https://instabase.zoom.us/j/96016718024)
*More info and recordings*: Tech talk confluence page (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/IB/pages/1263468737/IB+Tech+Talks)

Here is the monkey patch reference I was searching for that patches all the libraries for gevent:

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/shared-utils/py-utils/thread-utils/src/py/instabase/utils/concurrency/gevent.py
